name: Wikipedia Artificial Intelligence Article Verification
description: Verify search functionality on Wikipedia and validate the 'Artificial intelligence' article page layout and content.
requirements:
Navigate to https://www.wikipedia.org/ (the Wikipedia home page).
Search for the term “artificial intelligence.”
Trigger the search by pressing the Enter key.
Confirm that the search result directs you to the “Artificial intelligence” article page.
Verify the article contains the following key sections: History, Applications, Ethics.
Check that the article includes at least one image and one infobox with useful summary information.
Ensure the overall article layout is professional, well-organized, and easy to read.

action_instruction.expected_outcome: The Wikipedia landing page is displayed with logo and search input visible

action_instruction.target: search input box in the center of the page
action_instruction.expected_outcome: The text 'artificial intelligence' appears in the search input box
Browser navigates to the search results or directly to the article page

steps.description: Verify arrival on the 'Artificial intelligence' article page

action_instruction.description: Verify arrival on the 'Artificial intelligence' article page

action_instruction.expected_outcome: A section with heading 'History' is visible in the table of contents and article body
A section with heading 'Applications' is visible in the table of contents and article body
A section with heading 'Ethics' is visible in the table of contents and article body

steps.description: Check that at least one image is displayed in the article

action_instruction.description: Check that at least one image is displayed in the article
action_instruction.expected_outcome: At least one image is visible within the article body

steps.description: Check that an infobox with summary information appears

action_instruction.description: Check that an infobox with summary information appears
action_instruction.target: right-hand side of the article page
action_instruction.expected_outcome: An infobox with summary data (e.g., definition, origin) is visible

steps.description: Assess overall article layout for readability and organization

action_instruction.description: Assess overall article layout for readability and organization
action_instruction.expected_outcome: Text is well-structured into paragraphs and sections; headings are clear; content is easy to read
